lung.fish is a consortium of academic research laboratories and public health organizations whose mission is to advance environmental monitoring as a means of detecting, forecasting, and containing pathogen outbreaks.

title: About
text: Welcome to the lung.fish project‚Äôs public health data explorer, a growing collection of dashboards driven by environmental monitoring data. The lung.fish initiative focuses on improving environmental sampling and promoting open data sharing by publishing data and experiments in public repositories.

title: About
text:
üåç Our Mission
We aim to:

Enhance environmental data collection methods.
Facilitate more accessible and transparent sharing of environmental data.
Foster collaboration in the scientific community for better ecological understanding.

title: About
text:
üìä Open Data for All
We believe in the power of open science. To learn about the legal licenses, please reach out to us directly!
